name: Reborn: Scarlet Feathers
description:
Based of Zaxxon, an isometric shooter released in 1982, this prototype gives the player the experience of embodying the Phoenix urging to destroy the city of humans, flying while shooting at enemy entities.  The object of the game is to hit as many targets as possible without being shot down or running out of the crimson fire—which can be replenished throughout the game.

2019

Credits :   

Game designers : FOUCART Thomas, LEULIET Quentin, MILLION Mathéo.

Artists : BUISSET Florine, WELTER Marie.
